title: Side Effects of Addiction (with Raphael Saadiq)
description:
This week, music icon and legend Raphael Saadiq sits down to talk addiction, a reoccurring theme on his new album Jimmy Lee, available August 23. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
